00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Named extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'named';
00041     public $User= 'root|named';
00042     
00043     public $ConfFile= '/var/named/etc/named.conf';
00044     public $LogFile= '/var/log/named.log';
00045 
00046     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/sbin/named -v';
00047 
00048     public $PidFile= '/var/run/named.pid';
00049 
00050     function Named()
00051     {
00052         global $TmpFile;
00053         
00054         parent::Model();
00055         
00056         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/sbin/named > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00057         
00058         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00059             $this->Commands,
00060             array(
00061                 'GetForwarders' => array(
00062                     'argv'  => array(),
00063                     'desc'  => _('Get DNS forwarders'),
00064                     ),
00065 
00066                 'SetForwarders' => array(
00067                     'argv'  => array(IPADRLIST),
00068                     'desc'  => _('Set DNS forwarders'),
00069                     ),
00070                 )
00071             );
00072     }
00073 
00079     function GetForwarders()
00080     {
00081         return $this->SearchFile($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*forwarders\h*{\h*(.*)\h*\;\h*}\h*\;\h*$/m");
00082     }
00083 
00089     function SetForwarders($forwarders)
00090     {
00091         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*forwarders\h*{\h*)(.*)(\h*\;\h*}\h*\;\h*)$/m", '${1}'.$forwarders.'${3}');
00092     }
00093     
00094     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00095     {
00096         global $Re_Ip;
00097 
00098         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00099             $re_clientip= "($Re_Ip)";
00100             $re_num= '(\d+)';
00101             $re_domain= '(\S+)';
00102             $re_type= '(.*)';
00103 
00104             // client 127.0.0.1#31874: query: www.openbsd.org IN A +
00105             $re= "/client\s+$re_clientip#$re_num:\s+query:\s+$re_domain\s+\S+\s+$re_type$/";
00106             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00107                 $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00108                 $cols['Domain']= $match[3];
00109                 $cols['Type']= $match[4];
00110             }
00111             return TRUE;
00112         }
00113         return FALSE;
00114     }
00115 }
00116 ?>
